name: mcp-server-chart
description: generate_area_chart, generate_bar_chart, generate_boxplot_chart, generate_column_chart, generate_district_map, generate_dual_axes_chart, generate_fishbone_diagram, generate_flow_diagram, generate_funnel_chart, generate_histogram_chart, generate_line_chart, generate_liquid_chart, generate_mind_map, generate_network_graph, generate_organization_chart, generate_path_map, generate_pie_chart, generate_pin_map, generate_radar_chart, generate_sankey_chart, generate_scatter_chart, generate_treemap_chart, generate_venn_chart, generate_violin_chart, generate_waterfall_chart, generate_word_cloud_chart.

commands.name: generate_area_chart
commands.description: Generate a area chart to show data trends under continuous independent variables and observe the overall data trend, such as, displacement = velocity (average or instantaneous) × time: s = v × t. If the x-axis is time (t) and the y-axis is velocity (v) at each moment, an area chart allows you to observe the trend of velocity over time and infer the distance traveled by the area's size.

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"lineWidth":{"description":"Line width for the lines of chart, such as 4.","type":"number"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: data
args.description: Data for area chart, it should be an array of objects, each object contains a `time` field and a `value` field, such as, [{ time: '2015', value: 23 }, { time: '2016', value: 32 }], when stacking is needed for area, the data should contain a `group` field, such as, [{ time: '2015', value: 23, group: 'A' }, { time: '2015', value: 32, group: 'B' }]., 额外信息: items: {"properties":{"group":{"type":"string"},"time":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"number"}},"required":["time","value"],"type":"object"}, minItems: 1

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

args.name: axisXTitle
args.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

args.name: axisYTitle
args.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: stack
args.description: Whether stacking is enabled. When enabled, area charts require a 'group' field in the data.

commands.name: generate_bar_chart
commands.description: Generate a horizontal bar chart to show data for numerical comparisons among different categories, such as, comparing categorical data and for horizontal comparisons.

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: axisXTitle
args.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

args.name: axisYTitle
args.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

args.name: group
args.description: Whether grouping is enabled. When enabled, bar charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `group` is true, `stack` should be false.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: data
args.description: Data for bar chart, such as, [{ category: '分类一', value: 10 }, { category: '分类二', value: 20 }], when grouping or stacking is needed for bar, the data should contain a `group` field, such as, when [{ category: '北京', value: 825, group: '油车' }, { category: '北京', value: 1000, group: '电车' }]., 额外信息: minItems: 1, items: {"properties":{"category":{"type":"string"},"group":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"number"}},"required":["category","value"],"type":"object"}

args.name: stack
args.description: Whether stacking is enabled. When enabled, bar charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `stack` is true, `group` should be false.

commands.name: generate_boxplot_chart
commands.description: Generate a boxplot chart to show data for statistical summaries among different categories, such as, comparing the distribution of data points across categories.

args.name: axisYTitle
args.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: data
args.description: Data for boxplot chart, such as, [{ category: '分类一', value: 10 }] or [{ category: '分类二', value: 20, group: '组别一' }]., 额外信息: items: {"properties":{"category":{"description":"Category of the data point, such as '分类一'.","type":"string"},"group":{"description":"Optional group for the data point, used for grouping in the boxplot.","type":"string"},"value":{"description":"Value of the data point, such as 10.","type":"number"}},"required":["category","value"],"type":"object"}, minItems: 1

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"startAtZero":{"default":false,"description":"Whether to start the axis at zero, optional, default is false.","type":"boolean"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: axisXTitle
args.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

commands.name: generate_column_chart
commands.description: Generate a column chart, which are best for comparing categorical data, such as, when values are close, column charts are preferable because our eyes are better at judging height than other visual elements like area or angles.

args.name: stack
args.description: Whether stacking is enabled. When enabled, column charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `stack` is true, `group` should be false.

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: group
args.description: Whether grouping is enabled. When enabled, column charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `group` is true, `stack` should be false.

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: axisYTitle
args.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

args.name: data
args.description: Data for column chart, such as, [{ category: 'Category A', value: 10 }, { category: 'Category B', value: 20 }], when grouping or stacking is needed for column, the data should contain a 'group' field, such as, [{ category: 'Beijing', value: 825, group: 'Gas Car' }, { category: 'Beijing', value: 1000, group: 'Electric Car' }]., 额外信息: minItems: 1, items: {"properties":{"category":{"type":"string"},"group":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"number"}},"required":["category","value"],"type":"object"}

args.name: axisXTitle
args.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

commands.name: generate_district_map
commands.description: Generates regional distribution maps, which are usually used to show the administrative divisions and coverage of a dataset. It is not suitable for showing the distribution of specific locations, such as urban administrative divisions, GDP distribution maps of provinces and cities across the country, etc. This tool is limited to generating data maps within China.

args.name: data
args.description: Administrative division data, lower-level administrative divisions are optional. There are usually two scenarios: one is to simply display the regional composition, only `fillColor` needs to be configured, and all administrative divisions are consistent, representing that all blocks are connected as one; the other is the regional data distribution scenario, first determine the `dataType`, `dataValueUnit` and `dataLabel` configurations, `dataValue` should be a meaningful value and consistent with the meaning of dataType, and then determine the style configuration. The `fillColor` configuration represents the default fill color for areas without data. Lower-level administrative divisions do not need `fillColor` configuration, and their fill colors are determined by the `colors` configuration (If `dataType` is "number", only one base color (warm color) is needed in the list to calculate the continuous data mapping color band; if `dataType` is "enum", the number of color values in the list is equal to the number of enumeration values (contrast colors)). If `subdistricts` has a value, `showAllSubdistricts` must be set to true. For example, {"title": "陕西省地级市分布图", "data": {"name": "陕西省", "showAllSubdistricts": true, "dataLabel": "城市", "dataType": "enum", "colors": ["#4ECDC4", "#A5D8FF"], "subdistricts": [{"name": "西安市", "dataValue": "省会"}, {"name": "宝鸡市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "咸阳市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "铜川市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "渭南市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "延安市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "榆林市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "汉中市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "安康市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "商洛市", "dataValue": "地级市"}]}, "width": 1000, "height": 1000}., 额外信息: properties: {"colors":{"default":["#1783FF","#00C9C9","#F0884D","#D580FF","#7863FF","#60C42D","#BD8F24","#FF80CA","#2491B3","#17C76F"],"description":"Data color list, in rgb or rgba format.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"dataLabel":{"description":"Data label, such as \"GDP\"","type":"string"},"dataType":{"description":"The type of the data value, numeric or enumeration type","enum":["number","enum"],"type":"string"},"dataValue":{"description":"Data value, numeric string or enumeration string.","type":"string"},"dataValueUnit":{"description":"Data unit, such as \"万亿\"","type":"string"},"name":{"description":"Keywords for the Chinese name of an administrative region (must be within China), and must be one of China, province, city, district, or county. The name should be more specific and add attributive descriptions, for example, \"西安市\" is better than \"西安\", \"杭州西湖区\" is better than \"西湖区\". It cannot be a specific place name or a vague name, such as \"其它\".","type":"string"},"showAllSubdistricts":{"default":false,"description":"Whether to display all subdistricts.","type":"boolean"},"style":{"description":"Style settings.","properties":{"fillColor":{"description":"Fill color, rgb or rgba format.","type":"string"}},"type":"object"},"subdistricts":{"description":"Sub-administrative regions are used to display the regional composition or regional distribution of related data.","items":{"properties":{"dataValue":{"description":"Data value, numeric string or enumeration string.","type":"string"},"name":{"description":"Keywords for the Chinese name of an administrative region (must be within China), and must be one of China, province, city, district, or county. The name should be more specific and add attributive descriptions, for example, \"西安市\" is better than \"西安\", \"杭州西湖区\" is better than \"西湖区\". It cannot be a specific place name or a vague name, such as \"其它\".","type":"string"},"style":{"description":"Style settings.","properties":{"fillColor":{"description":"Fill color, rgb or rgba format.","type":"string"}},"type":"object"}},"required":["name"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"}}, required: ["name"]

args.name: title
args.description: The map title should not exceed 16 characters. The content should be consistent with the information the map wants to convey and should be accurate, rich, creative, and attractive.

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of map, default is 1600.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of map, default is 1000.

commands.name: generate_dual_axes_chart
commands.description: Generate a dual axes chart which is a combination chart that integrates two different chart types, typically combining a bar chart with a line chart to display both the trend and comparison of data, such as, the trend of sales and profit over time.

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: series
args.description: Series for dual axes chart, such as, [{ type: 'column', data: [91.9, 99.1, 101.6, 114.4, 121], axisYTitle: '销售额' }, { type: 'line', data: [0.055, 0.06, 0.062, 0.07, 0.075], 'axisYTitle': '利润率' }]., 额外信息: items: {"properties":{"axisYTitle":{"default":"","description":"Set the y-axis title of the chart series, such as, axisYTitle: '销售额'.","type":"string"},"data":{"description":"When type is column, the data represents quantities, such as [91.9, 99.1, 101.6, 114.4, 121]. When type is line, the data represents ratios and its values are recommended to be less than 1, such as [0.055, 0.06, 0.062, 0.07, 0.075].","items":{"type":"number"},"type":"array"},"type":{"description":"The optional value can be 'column' or 'line'.","enum":["column","line"],"type":"string"}},"required":["type","data"],"type":"object"}, minItems: 1

args.name: axisXTitle
args.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

args.name: categories
args.description: Categories for dual axes chart, such as, ['2015', '2016', '2017']., 额外信息: minItems: 1, items: {"type":"string"}

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"startAtZero":{"default":false,"description":"Whether to start the axis at zero, optional, default is false.","type":"boolean"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

commands.name: generate_fishbone_diagram
commands.description: Generate a fishbone diagram chart to uses a fish skeleton, like structure to display the causes or effects of a core problem, with the problem as the fish head and the causes/effects as the fish bones. It suits problems that can be split into multiple related factors.

args.name: data
args.description: Data for fishbone diagram chart which is a hierarchical structure, such as, { name: 'main topic', children: [{ name: 'topic 1', children: [{ name: 'subtopic 1-1' }] }] }, and the maximum depth is 3., 额外信息: properties: {"children":{"items":{"properties":{"children":{"items":{"properties":{"children":{"items":{"properties":{"name":{"type":"string"}},"required":["name"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"name":{"type":"string"}},"required":["name"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"name":{"type":"string"}},"required":["name"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"name":{"type":"string"}}, required: ["name"]

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

commands.name: generate_flow_diagram
commands.description: Generate a flow diagram chart to show the steps and decision points of a process or system, such as, scenarios requiring linear process presentation.

args.name: data
args.description: Data for flow diagram chart, such as, { nodes: [{ name: 'node1' }, { name: 'node2' }], edges: [{ source: 'node1', target: 'node2', name: 'edge1' }] }., 额外信息: required: ["nodes","edges"], properties: {"edges":{"items":{"properties":{"name":{"default":"","type":"string"},"source":{"type":"string"},"target":{"type":"string"}},"required":["source","target"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"nodes":{"items":{"properties":{"name":{"type":"string"}},"required":["name"],"type":"object"},"minItems":1,"type":"array"}}

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

commands.name: generate_funnel_chart
commands.description: Generate a funnel chart to visualize the progressive reduction of data as it passes through stages, such as, the conversion rates of users from visiting a website to completing a purchase.

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: data
args.description: Data for funnel chart, such as, [{ category: '浏览网站', value: 50000 }, { category: '放入购物车', value: 35000 }, { category: '生成订单', value: 25000 }, { category: '支付订单', value: 15000 }, { category: '完成交易', value: 8000 }]., 额外信息: items: {"properties":{"category":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"number"}},"required":["category","value"],"type":"object"}, minItems: 1

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

commands.name: generate_histogram_chart
commands.description: Generate a histogram chart to show the frequency of data points within a certain range. It can observe data distribution, such as, normal and skewed distributions, and identify data concentration areas and extreme points.

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: axisXTitle
args.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: axisYTitle
args.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

args.name: data
args.description: Data for histogram chart, it should be an array of numbers, such as, [78, 88, 60, 100, 95]., 额外信息: items: {"type":"number"}, minItems: 1

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: binNumber
args.description: Number of intervals to define the number of intervals in a histogram, when not specified, a built-in value will be used.

commands.name: generate_line_chart
commands.description: Generate a line chart to show trends over time, such as, the ratio of Apple computer sales to Apple's profits changed from 2000 to 2016.

args.name: axisXTitle
args.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"lineWidth":{"description":"Line width for the lines of chart, such as 4.","type":"number"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"startAtZero":{"default":false,"description":"Whether to start the axis at zero, optional, default is false.","type":"boolean"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: data
args.description: Data for line chart, it should be an array of objects, each object contains a `time` field and a `value` field, such as, [{ time: '2015', value: 23 }, { time: '2016', value: 32 }], when the data is grouped by time, the `group` field should be used to specify the group, such as, [{ time: '2015', value: 23, group: 'A' }, { time: '2015', value: 32, group: 'B' }]., 额外信息: minItems: 1, items: {"properties":{"group":{"type":"string"},"time":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"number"}},"required":["time","value"],"type":"object"}

args.name: axisYTitle
args.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

commands.name: generate_liquid_chart
commands.description: Generate a liquid chart to visualize a single value as a percentage, such as, the current occupancy rate of a reservoir or the completion percentage of a project.

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: percent
args.description: The percentage value to display in the liquid chart, should be a number between 0 and 1, where 1 represents 100%. For example, 0.75 represents 75%., 额外信息: minimum: 0, maximum: 1

args.name: shape
args.description: The shape of the liquid chart, can be 'circle', 'rect', 'pin', or 'triangle'. Default is 'circle'., 额外信息: enum: ["circle","rect","pin","triangle"]

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"color":{"description":"Custom color for the liquid chart, if not specified, defaults to the theme color.","type":"string"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

commands.name: generate_mind_map
commands.description: Generate a mind map chart to organizes and presents information in a hierarchical structure with branches radiating from a central topic, such as, a diagram showing the relationship between a main topic and its subtopics.

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: data
args.description: Data for mind map chart which is a hierarchical structure, such as, { name: 'main topic', children: [{ name: 'topic 1', children: [{ name:'subtopic 1-1' }] }, and the maximum depth is 3., 额外信息: properties: {"children":{"items":{"properties":{"children":{"items":{"properties":{"children":{"items":{"properties":{"name":{"type":"string"}},"required":["name"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"name":{"type":"string"}},"required":["name"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"name":{"type":"string"}},"required":["name"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"name":{"type":"string"}}, required: ["name"]

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

commands.name: generate_network_graph
commands.description: Generate a network graph chart to show relationships (edges) between entities (nodes), such as, relationships between people in social networks.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: data
args.description: Data for network graph chart, such as, { nodes: [{ name: 'node1' }, { name: 'node2' }], edges: [{ source: 'node1', target: 'node2', name: 'edge1' }] }, 额外信息: properties: {"edges":{"items":{"properties":{"name":{"default":"","type":"string"},"source":{"type":"string"},"target":{"type":"string"}},"required":["source","target"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"nodes":{"items":{"properties":{"name":{"type":"string"}},"required":["name"],"type":"object"},"minItems":1,"type":"array"}}, required: ["nodes","edges"]

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

commands.name: generate_organization_chart
commands.description: Generate an organization chart to visualize the hierarchical structure of an organization, such as, a diagram showing the relationship between a CEO and their direct reports.

args.name: orient
args.description: Orientation of the organization chart, either horizontal or vertical. Default is vertical, when the level of the chart is more than 3, it is recommended to use horizontal orientation., 额外信息: enum: ["horizontal","vertical"]

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: data
args.description: Data for organization chart which is a hierarchical structure, such as, { name: 'CEO', description: 'Chief Executive Officer', children: [{ name: 'CTO', description: 'Chief Technology Officer', children: [{ name: 'Dev Manager', description: 'Development Manager' }] }] }, and the maximum depth is 3., 额外信息: properties: {"children":{"items":{"properties":{"children":{"items":{"properties":{"children":{"items":{"properties":{"description":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"}},"required":["name"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"description":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"}},"required":["name"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"description":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"}},"required":["name"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"description":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"}}, required: ["name"]

commands.name: generate_path_map
commands.description: Generate a route map to display the user's planned route, such as travel guide routes.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of map, default is 1000.

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of map, default is 1600.

args.name: data
args.description: Routes, each group represents all POIs along a route. For example, [{ "data": ["西安钟楼", "西安大唐不夜城", "西安大雁塔"] }, { "data": ["西安曲江池公园", "西安回民街"] }], 额外信息: minItems: 1, items: {"description":"The route and places along it.","properties":{"data":{"description":"A list of keywords for the names of points of interest (POIs) in Chinese. These POIs usually contain a group of places with similar locations, so the names should be more descriptive, must adding attributives to indicate that they are different places in the same area, such as \"北京市\" is better than \"北京\", \"杭州西湖\" is better than \"西湖\"; in addition, if you can determine that a location may appear in multiple areas, you can be more specific, such as \"杭州西湖的苏堤春晓\" is better than \"苏堤春晓\". The tool will use these keywords to search for specific POIs and query their detailed data, such as latitude and longitude, location photos, etc. For example, [\"西安钟楼\", \"西安大唐不夜城\", \"西安大雁塔\"].","items":{"type":"string"},"minItems":1,"type":"array"}},"required":["data"],"type":"object"}

args.name: title
args.description: The map title should not exceed 16 characters. The content should be consistent with the information the map wants to convey and should be accurate, rich, creative, and attractive.

commands.name: generate_pie_chart
commands.description: Generate a pie chart to show the proportion of parts, such as, market share and budget allocation.

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

args.name: innerRadius
args.description: Set the innerRadius of pie chart, the value between 0 and 1. Set the pie chart as a donut chart. Set the value to 0.6 or number in [0 ,1] to enable it.

args.name: data
args.description: Data for pie chart, it should be an array of objects, each object contains a `category` field and a `value` field, such as, [{ category: '分类一', value: 27 }]., 额外信息: items: {"properties":{"category":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"number"}},"required":["category","value"],"type":"object"}, minItems: 1

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

commands.name: generate_pin_map
commands.description: Generate a point map to display the location and distribution of point data on the map, such as the location distribution of attractions, hospitals, supermarkets, etc.

args.name: data
args.description: A list of keywords for the names of points of interest (POIs) in Chinese. These POIs usually contain a group of places with similar locations, so the names should be more descriptive, must adding attributives to indicate that they are different places in the same area, such as "北京市" is better than "北京", "杭州西湖" is better than "西湖"; in addition, if you can determine that a location may appear in multiple areas, you can be more specific, such as "杭州西湖的苏堤春晓" is better than "苏堤春晓". The tool will use these keywords to search for specific POIs and query their detailed data, such as latitude and longitude, location photos, etc. For example, ["西安钟楼", "西安大唐不夜城", "西安大雁塔"]., 额外信息: items: {"type":"string"}, minItems: 1

args.name: markerPopup
args.description: Marker type, one is simple mode, which is just an icon and does not require `markerPopup` configuration; the other is image mode, which displays location photos and requires `markerPopup` configuration. Among them, `width`/`height`/`borderRadius` can be combined to realize rectangular photos and square photos. In addition, when `borderRadius` is half of the width and height, it can also be a circular photo., 额外信息: properties: {"borderRadius":{"default":8,"description":"Border radius of the photo.","type":"number"},"height":{"default":40,"description":"Height of the photo.","type":"number"},"type":{"default":"image","description":"Must be \"image\".","type":"string"},"width":{"default":40,"description":"Width of the photo.","type":"number"}}

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of map, default is 1600.

args.name: title
args.description: The map title should not exceed 16 characters. The content should be consistent with the information the map wants to convey and should be accurate, rich, creative, and attractive.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of map, default is 1000.

commands.name: generate_radar_chart
commands.description: Generate a radar chart to display multidimensional data (four dimensions or more), such as, evaluate Huawei and Apple phones in terms of five dimensions: ease of use, functionality, camera, benchmark scores, and battery life.

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"lineWidth":{"description":"Line width for the lines of chart, such as 4.","type":"number"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: data
args.description: Data for radar chart, it should be an array of objects, each object contains a `name` field and a `value` field, such as, [{ name: 'Design', value: 70 }], when the data is grouped by `group`, the `group` field is required, such as, [{ name: 'Design', value: 70, group: 'Huawei' }]., 额外信息: minItems: 1, items: {"properties":{"group":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"number"}},"required":["name","value"],"type":"object"}

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

commands.name: generate_sankey_chart
commands.description: Generate a sankey chart to visualize the flow of data between different stages or categories, such as, the user journey from landing on a page to completing a purchase.

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: nodeAlign
args.description: Alignment of nodes in the sankey chart, such as, 'left', 'right', 'justify', or 'center'., 额外信息: enum: ["left","right","justify","center"]

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: data
args.description: Date for sankey chart, such as, [{ source: 'Landing Page', target: 'Product Page', value: 50000 }, { source: 'Product Page', target: 'Add to Cart', value: 35000 }, { source: 'Add to Cart', target: 'Checkout', value: 25000 }, { source: 'Checkout', target: 'Payment', value: 15000 }, { source: 'Payment', target: 'Purchase Completed', value: 8000 }]., 额外信息: items: {"properties":{"source":{"type":"string"},"target":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"number"}},"required":["source","target","value"],"type":"object"}, minItems: 1

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

commands.name: generate_scatter_chart
commands.description: Generate a scatter chart to show the relationship between two variables, helps discover their relationship or trends, such as, the strength of correlation, data distribution patterns.

args.name: axisYTitle
args.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: data
args.description: Data for scatter chart, such as, [{ x: 10, y: 15 }], when the data is grouped, the group name can be specified in the `group` field, such as, [{ x: 10, y: 15, group: 'Group A' }]., 额外信息: minItems: 1, items: {"properties":{"group":{"description":"Group name for the data point.","type":"string"},"x":{"type":"number"},"y":{"type":"number"}},"required":["x","y"],"type":"object"}

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: axisXTitle
args.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

commands.name: generate_treemap_chart
commands.description: Generate a treemap chart to display hierarchical data and can intuitively show comparisons between items at the same level, such as, show disk space usage with treemap.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: data
args.description: Data for treemap chart which is a hierarchical structure, such as, [{ name: 'Design', value: 70, children: [{ name: 'Tech', value: 20 }] }], and the maximum depth is 3., 额外信息: items: {"properties":{"children":{"items":{"properties":{"children":{"items":{"properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"number"}},"required":["name","value"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"name":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"number"}},"required":["name","value"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"name":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"number"}},"required":["name","value"],"type":"object"}, minItems: 1

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

commands.name: generate_venn_chart
commands.description: Generate a Venn diagram to visualize the relationships between different sets, showing how they intersect and overlap, such as the commonalities and differences between various groups.

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: data
args.description: Data for venn chart, such as, [{ label: 'A', value: 10, sets: ['A'] }, { label: 'B', value: 20, sets: ['B'] }, { label: 'C', value: 30, sets: ['C'] }, { label: 'AB', value: 5, sets: ['A', 'B'] }]., 额外信息: minItems: 1, items: {"properties":{"label":{"description":"Label for the venn chart segment, such as 'A', 'B', or 'C'.","type":"string"},"sets":{"description":"Array of set names that this segment belongs to, such as ['A', 'B'] for an intersection between sets A and B.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"value":{"description":"Value for the venn chart segment, such as 10, 20, or 30.","type":"number"}},"required":["value","sets"],"type":"object"}

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

commands.name: generate_violin_chart
commands.description: Generate a violin chart to show data for statistical summaries among different categories, such as, comparing the distribution of data points across categories.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: axisYTitle
args.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

args.name: axisXTitle
args.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"startAtZero":{"default":false,"description":"Whether to start the axis at zero, optional, default is false.","type":"boolean"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

args.name: data
args.description: Data for violin chart, such as, [{ category: 'Category A', value: 10 }], when the data is grouped, the 'group' field is required, such as, [{ category: 'Category B', value: 20, group: 'Group A' }]., 额外信息: items: {"properties":{"category":{"description":"Category of the data point, such as '分类一'.","type":"string"},"group":{"description":"Optional group for the data point, used for grouping in the violin chart.","type":"string"},"value":{"description":"Value of the data point, such as 10.","type":"number"}},"required":["category","value"],"type":"object"}, minItems: 1

commands.name: generate_waterfall_chart
commands.description: Generate a waterfall chart to visualize the cumulative effect of sequentially introduced positive or negative values, such as showing how an initial value is affected by a series of intermediate positive or negative values leading to a final result. Waterfall charts are ideal for financial analysis, budget tracking, profit and loss statements, and understanding the composition of changes over time or categories.

args.name: axisYTitle
args.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: axisXTitle
args.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"palette":{"properties":{"negativeColor":{"description":"Color for negative values (decreases). Default is '#2EBB59'.","type":"string"},"positiveColor":{"description":"Color for positive values (increases). Default is '#FF4D4F'.","type":"string"},"totalColor":{"description":"Color for total and intermediate total bars. Default is '#1783FF'.","type":"string"}},"type":"object"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: data
args.description: Data for waterfall chart, it should be an array of objects. Each object must contain a `category` field. For regular items, a `value` field is also required. The `isIntermediateTotal` field marks intermediate subtotals, and the `isTotal` field marks the final total. For example, [{ category: 'Initial', value: 100 }, { category: 'Increase', value: 50 }, { category: 'Subtotal', isIntermediateTotal: true }, { category: 'Decrease', value: -30 }, { category: 'Total', isTotal: true }]., 额外信息: items: {"properties":{"category":{"type":"string"},"isIntermediateTotal":{"type":"boolean"},"isTotal":{"type":"boolean"},"value":{"type":"number"}},"required":["category"],"type":"object"}, minItems: 1

commands.name: generate_word_cloud_chart
commands.description: Generate a word cloud chart to show word frequency or weight through text size variation, such as, analyzing common words in social media, reviews, or feedback.

args.name: width
args.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

args.name: data
args.description: Data for word cloud chart, it should be an array of objects, each object contains a `text` field and a `value` field, such as, [{ value: 4.272, text: '形成' }]., 额外信息: items: {"properties":{"text":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"number"}},"required":["text","value"],"type":"object"}, minItems: 1

args.name: theme
args.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'., 额外信息: enum: ["default","academy","dark"]

args.name: height
args.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

args.name: style
args.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional., 额外信息: properties: {"backgroundColor":{"description":"Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.","type":"string"},"palette":{"description":"Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"texture":{"default":"default","description":"Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.","enum":["default","rough"],"type":"string"}}

args.name: title
args.description: Set the title of chart.
